caption.title: Instantaneous rate of population increase of C. maculatus exposed to clove and cinnamon essential oils.
caption.p: The symbols represent the means of five replicates of the LD 0 (control), LD 20, LD 40, LD 60 and LD 80 for each oil. The doses are expressed in Î¼L of essential oil/kg beans. The vertical bars represent the SD.
